name: improvement-1771978250-7
description: Create API rate limiting and authentication tokens
verification: Created lib/api-auth.sh with token generation, validation, rate limiting (100/hour default), scopes, and revocation. Added 'autonomy api-auth' command. Tested: generated token 'web-ui', validated successfully, list shows token details
evidence: Token validation returns valid=true with remaining count
autonomy api-auth list shows token details
